channel.title: CVE Feed for Shop Beat -- studio
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Shop Beat -- studio

item.title: CVE-2022-36250|2024-08-03T10:00:04.276Z -- shop%20beat -- studio
item.description: Shop Beat Solutions (Pty) LTD Shop Beat Media Player 2.5.95 up to 3.2.57 is vulnerable to Cross Site Request Forgery (CSRF).

item.title: CVE-2022-36249|2024-08-03T10:00:04.181Z -- shop%20beat -- studio
item.description: Shop Beat Solutions (Pty) LTD Shop Beat Media Player 2.5.95 up to 3.2.57 is vulnerable to Bypass 2FA via APIs. For Controlpanel Lite. "After login we are directly able to use the bearer token or jsession ID to access the apis instead of entering the 2FA code. Thus, leading to bypass of 2FA on API level.

item.title: CVE-2022-36247|2024-08-03T10:00:04.371Z -- shop%20beat -- studio
item.description: Shop Beat Solutions (Pty) LTD Shop Beat Media Player 2.5.95 up to 3.2.57 is vulnerable to IDOR via controlpanel.shopbeat.co.za.

item.title: CVE-2022-36244|2024-08-03T10:00:04.295Z -- shop%20beat -- studio
item.description: Shop Beat Solutions (Pty) LTD Shop Beat Media Player 2.5.95 up to 3.2.57 suffers from Multiple Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities via Shop Beat Control Panel found at www.shopbeat.co.za controlpanel.shopbeat.co.za.

item.title: CVE-2022-36246|2024-08-03T10:00:04.281Z -- shop%20beat -- studio
item.description: Shop Beat Solutions (Pty) LTD Shop Beat Media Player 2.5.95 up to 3.2.57 is vulnerable to Insecure Permissions.

item.title: CVE-2022-36243|2024-08-03T10:00:04.272Z -- shop%20beat -- studio
item.description: Shop Beat Solutions (pty) LTD Shop Beat Media Player 2.5.95 up to 3.2.57 is vulnerable to Directory Traversal via server.shopbeat.co.za. Information Exposure Through Directory Listing vulnerability in "studio" software of Shop Beat. This issue affects: Shop Beat studio studio versions prior to 3.2.57 on arm.
